source.name: Managing conversations with the ChatGPT API
source.instructions:
**True or False:**
When managing conversations with the ChatGPT API, it is important to incorporate user messages and ensure each team member is represented using distinct user roles or identifiers.
source.guidance: The lesson mentions the importance of incorporating user messages and ensuring that each team member is represented in the conversation when managing conversations using the ChatGPT API. This helps create a more cohesive and interactive discussion.
